Helper functions for moist air enthalpy calculation
See p. 7-7 in ASHRAE HVACTK 2.

double SPARK::hvactk2::enth (double TDb, double w)
 Formula for enthalpy as a function of dry bulb temperature and humidity ratio.

 Formula for dry bulb temperature as a function of enthalpy and humidity ratio.

 Formula for humidity ratio as a function of enthalpy and dry bulb temperature.
